title: Ep 20: Compassion, Anger and Control with DHAYA LAKSHMINARAYANAN
description: In this episode Dhaya and I go deep on compassion, anger and relinquishing control - the holy trinity of human drama. She's hot off a meditation retreat and I have so many questions for her - like how annoying was everyone else on the retreat? How do you deal with your own thoughts for days on end with no interruption?  Dhaya is a gracious and enlightening guest. I know you'll love her.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
